name: 廖昭文
objective: The objective of this course is to develop not only reading skills, but also the ability to think critically. It focuses on strengthening reading comprehension and encourages critical reading skills. A variety of strategies will be presented to assist the student in improving vocabulary, comprehension, reading rate, and flexibility in reading.
